content.question: Paying by debit or credit card
content.when: After sending your application, you must wait for 2 working days before calling to allow time for the court to receive and check your application.
content.openHours: The court is open to take payments from 10:00am to 2:00pm, Monday to Friday
content.callCourt: You can call the court on {{ courts.eastMidlands.phone }}
